docs.lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES IN the final hours, the sites begin to blur together in a kaleidoscope of pastel colors and the blare of the Olympic theme. But the people and the sports were different, sometimes strikingly so. - On the final Friday night, wrestling in person, water polo on television. At the wrestling matches in Anaheim, there was a strong emphasis on aggressiveness, but in the water polo at Malibu, there was a reward for stalling.
